css: .icon-feature{margin:auto;text-align:center;padding:5px 5px 20px}.icon-feature img{height:150px;margin-bottom:15px}.item-feature{text-align:center;margin-bottom:10px;margin-top:10px;padding:5px}.mw-400{max-width:400px;margin:auto}.p1 h2::after,.p3 h2::after,.p6 h2::after,.p7 h2::after{content:"";display:block;width:65px;height:6px;border-bottom:4px solid #222;margin:0}.mb-40{margin-bottom:40px}.p5 h2::after{content:"";display:block;width:65px;border-bottom:4px solid #222;margin:0}.p4 h4,.p5 h4{margin-bottom:30px;margin-top:5px;font-size:1em}
